alert.note: Alert for Hill; Limestone; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 6:06PM CDT until June 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern McLennan County in central Texas... Northwestern Limestone County in central Texas... Southeastern Hill County in central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 606 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West, or 10 miles northeast of Lacy-Lakeview, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waco, Bellmead, Lacy-Lakeview, West, Mart, Hubbard, Riesel, Coolidge, Hallsburg, Tradinghouse Creek Reservoir, Lake Mexia, Northcrest, Lake Creek Lake, Gholson, Abbott, Leroy, Mount Calm, Ross, Penelope and Watt. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 338 and 358. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
